00021 #ifndef GAMESTATE_H
00022 #define GAMESTATE_H
00023 
00024 #include "platform-engine.h"
00025 
00026 namespace Platform {
00027 
00028 /**********************************************************/
00046 class GameState {
00047         public:
00048                 //** Prepares state subsystems and scripts.
00049     virtual void Init( SDL_Surface* theDisplay = NULL,
00050                        const char* theScript = NULL 
00051                      ) = 0 ;
00052 
00053                 //** Cleans up any remaining state assets.
00054                 virtual void Cleanup() = 0;
00055 
00056                 //** Halts execution of the state's operations.
00057                 virtual void Pause();
00058 
00059                 //** Resumes state execution.
00060                 virtual void Resume();
00061 
00062                 //** Handles any events that are particular to the state
00063                 virtual bool HandleEvents(  PlatformEngine* game,
00064                                         SDL_Event& event ) = 0;
00065 
00066                 //** Updates the state's logic
00067                 virtual void Update(        PlatformEngine* game ) = 0;
00068                 
00069                 //** Draws the visual content of the state to the engine. 
00070                 virtual void Draw() = 0;
00071                 
00072                 //** Explicitly Switches the engine to another state.
00073                 void ChangeState(       PlatformEngine* game,
00074                                         GameState* state ) {
00075                         game->ChangeState( state );
00076                 }
00077 
00078 
00079         protected:
00080                 bool running;
00081 
00082                 char* stateScriptPath;
00083 
00084     SDL_Surface* mainScreen;
00085 };
00086 
00087 }
00088 
00089 #endif
